thread.title: Lupillo Rivera Exits The House of Famous All-Stars
thread.title_full: Lupillo Rivera Exits The House of Famous All-Stars

author: world today news
title: Lupillo Rivera Exits The House of Famous All-Stars
text:
Lupillo Rivera Voluntarily Exits “ The House of Famous All-Stars “ CITY — May 01, 2025 — In a stunning turn of events, reality TV star lupillo Rivera has exited *The House of famous All-Stars*, leaving fans and fellow contestants shocked. The surprise exit, announced after 86 days on the show, stemmed from a medical issue , according to Rivera.The details surrounding this situation remain undisclosed. For more developments on Lupillo Rivera’s condition and his departure, stay tuned.
Lupillo Rivera Voluntarily Exits “The House of Famous All-Stars” After 86 days in the spotlight, Lupillo Rivera has made a surprising departure from Telemundo ‘s reality show, “The House of Famous All-Stars.” Rivera, known as the “strategist” of the show, cited a critical medical situation as the reason for his voluntary exit.
Rivera’s Farewell In an emotional address to the remaining contestants, Rivera explained his decision:
For a medical situation, a critical situation, I will not be able to continue here in the house of the celebrities. I have had a good time with you. I had a bad time. I apologize to each one of you … I love this game, I love winning, I love losing, I love to discuss, I love putting things in check. I will miss them a lot,my friends and my room apologize. It is not within my reach,I need to address this situation. I just wish you the best.
He concluded his farewell with a heartfelt message:
With all my heart, I tell you, to win the best.
Rivera then bid farewell to each of the 10 remaining inhabitants of the house.
Show Details “the celebrity’s house: All-Stars”, conducted by Jimena Gállego and Javier Poza, is broadcast from Monday to Friday at 7:00 pm (Tuesday at 11:30 pm) by Telemundo Puerto Rico and Sundays at 7:00 pm by point 2.
FAQ Why did Lupillo Rivera leave the show? He cited a critical medical situation.
What show did he leave? “The House of Famous All-Stars” on Telemundo.
How long was he on the show? 86 days.
Did You Know? Lupillo Rivera is known as the “strategist” on “The House of Famous All-Stars.”
Pro Tip Watching the show on Telemundo Puerto Rico from Monday to Friday at 7:00 pm (Tuesday at 11:30 pm) and Sundays at 7:00 pm by point 2.
